what: Open RStudio and Load Core Packages
title: Using sismar R package to tidy SISMA tabular program data
text: Let’s begin opening new RStudio work session. session open, create new R script (File -> New File -> R script) load core R packages needed tidying SISMA .csv exports. Tidyverse collection open-source packages designed general data science use. Sismar package designed specific purpose cleaning, reshaping feature engineering provided standard SISMA DHIS2 tabular exports. Finally, Glue packages provides interpreted string literals allow us combine use string values within code.

what: Overview of programmatic data type options
title: Cleans and transforms SISMA programmatic data sets into a tidy format useful for analysis in R/PowerBI/Tableau. — parse_sisma_csv
text: SMI-CPN: CPN, Saude Materna Infantil SMI-MAT: Maternidade, Saude Materna Infantil SMI-CCR: CCR, Saude Materna Infantil SMI-CPP: CCP, Saude Materna Infantil SMI-CCD: CCD, Saude Materna Infantil SMI-CCS: CCS, Saude Materna Infantil SMI-PAV: PAV, Saude Materna Infantil ATS Result: ATS Resultados, Programa de HIV ATS History: ATS Historial e Populacoes Chave, Programa de HIV ATS CI: ATS Caso Indice e Ligacao, Programa de HIV ATS SAAJ: ATS Serviço Amigo Adolescente Joven ATS CCSD: Consulta da Crianca Sadia e Consulta da Crianca Doente ATS SMI: ATS especifico SMI (outros acomopanhantes na CPN, etc.) ATS Auto: ATS Autotestagem, Programa de HIV HIV TARV: Tratamento Antiretroviral (TARV), Programa de HIV HIV PREP: Profilaxia Pré-Exposição (PrEP), Programa de HIV HIV APSS: Apoio Psicossocial (APSS), Programa de HIV HIV : Infecções de Transmissão Sexual (), Programa de HIV HIV AJMHCMM: Adolescent Joven Mentor, Homen Campeao, Maes Mentora HIV DAH: Doenca Avancada HIV
